entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 10:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
